verbose_text: In both OP9 cells and 3T3-L1 cells, maximal average C/EBPbeta expression occurred 1-2 days after the induction of adipogenesis, preceding the induction of maximal PPARgamma and C/EBPalpha expression, and followed after a delay by maximal lipid droplet formation (XREF_FIG and XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY).
